text: Sorry for the delay, i mean i would like to call my global module in french for example. I want to force it by code :slightly_smiling_face:

Hey guys, new to the dev Slack. Been trying to modify our blog listings to display as 3x1 instead of a vertical list. Attached original code & modified code.

It technically works by adding a nested loop index after the for statement. However, it is limited to 7 posts which I believe was what was listed on a single page. Any insight would be awesome. Thanks!
I think that 7 is set in blog settings
